author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36938#issuecomment-1128887595 demonstrated a case where a `SwitchProducer` was in a `ConditionalTask`, and `SwitchProducer`'s non-chosen `EDAlias` case was consumed explicitly by a module with `callWhenNewProductsRegistered()` in the same `ConditionalTask`/`Path`, and the alias-for EDModule was left unscheduled. This PR makes the code to process all `EDAlias` cases of the `SwitchProducer`, so that the `callWhenNewProductsRegistered()` that consume any of the EDAlias cases gets called early enough for the consumes information check in the `ConditionalTask` logic to work properly.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests in `FWCore/Integration` succeed. The test case https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36938#issuecomment-1128887595 works now as expected.
title: Fix behavior of SwitchProducer in ConditionalTask with non-chosen EDAlias case(s) that are consumed explicitly with callWhenNewProductsRegistered()
